Kinetic_Shield.help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Kinetic_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Kinetic_Shield.attackerHit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Dampening_Field.help: Your body resonates a mild Dampening Field that absorbs kinetic energy from physical weapons. This auto power permanently reduces all incoming Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Power_Shield.help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
Power_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Power_Shield.attackerHit: You Power Shield increased you Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks.

Energy_Protection.help: Your ability to channel energy makes you naturally resistant to Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Quick_Strike.help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

Body_Blow.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Repulsing_Torrent.help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
